column1: For release at 2 p.m. EDTThe Federal Reserve Board on Tuesday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from July 18 through August 9, 2005.The minutes are attached.Attachment (30 KB PDF)2005 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: September 6, 2005
